body:
Manual page https://github.com/NixOS/nix/blob/ffeabf8390f69d6bb002c2a4e17eef186ecaa32d/doc/manual/installation/prerequisites-source.xml and [previous versions](https://github.com/NixOS/nix/commits/ffeabf8390f69d6bb002c2a4e17eef186ecaa32d/doc/manual/installation/prerequisites-source.xml) thereof.

Requires PR #10910.
title: nix: improve dependencies based on prerequisites from manual.
